</>

jail

jogging suit

jogtrot

joined-up

<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><h-g </>

eid="trip_xgs_3" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f50"><x-g-blk eid="trip_xg_9"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="trip_x_9" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f4e" e_inline="y" tranID="5" status="6">a business trip<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>å‡ºå·®</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="trip_xg_10"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="trip_x_10" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f4c" e_inline="y" tranID="7" status="6">a five-minute trip by taxi<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>äº”åˆ†é’Ÿçš„å‡ºç§Ÿè½¦è½¦ç¨‹</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="trip_li_8" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f4b" e_inline="y"><unsyn>journey</unsyn> <und margined="n"> an act of travelling from one place to another, especially when they are a long way apart<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>å°¤æŒ‡é•¿é€”æ—…è¡Œ</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="trip_xgs_4" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f49"><x-g-blk </chnsep><chn>æ¼«é•¿è€Œè‰°éš¾çš„ç¿»å±±æ—…è¡Œ</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="trip_h3_1" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f46" e_inline="y" tranID="10" status="6">trip or journey?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>ç”¨ trip è¿˜æ˜¯ journeyï¼Ÿ</chn></h3><p eid="trip_p_2" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f45" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">A  <eb>trip</eb>  usually involves you going to a place and back again; a  <eb>journey</eb>  is usually one-way. A  <eb>trip</eb>  is often shorter than a  <eb>journey</eb>, although it does not have to be.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>trip é€šå¸¸ä¸ºå¾€è¿”æ—…è¡Œï¼Œjourney é€šå¸¸ä¸ºå•ç¨‹æ—…è¡Œã€‚trip çš„è¡Œç¨‹å¸¸è¾ƒ journey çŸ­ï¼Œä½†å¹¶éä¸€å®šå¦‚æ­¤</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="trip_xgs_5" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f40"><x-g-blk eid="trip_xg_12"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="trip_x_12" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f3e" e_inline="y" tranID="12" status="6">a trip to New York<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>å»çº½çº¦çš„æ—…è¡Œ</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="trip_xg_13"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="trip_x_13" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f3c" e_inline="y" tranID="14" status="6">a round-the-world trip<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>ç¯çƒæ—…è¡Œ</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs><und margined="y">It is often short in time, even if it is long in distance.  <eb>Journey</eb>  is more often used when the travelling takes a long time and is difficult. In North American English  <eb>journey</eb>  is not used for short trips.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>å³ä½¿è·ç¦»è¿œï¼Œtrip æ‰€èŠ±æ—¶é—´å¸¸å¸¸ä¸é•¿ã€‚å¦‚æœæ—…ç¨‹é•¿ä¸”è‰°éš¾è¾ƒå¸¸ç”¨ journeyã€‚åœ¨ç¾å¼è‹±è¯­ä¸­ï¼Œjourney ä¸ç”¨ä»¥æŒ‡çŸ­é€”æ—…è¡Œ</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="trip_xgs_6" e_id="13cbac587f0.-3f37"><x-g-blk eid="trip_xg_14"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><label-g-blk>(<label-g><geo-blk><geo geo="br"><xhtml:a href="helpg:br"><brelabel>BrE</brelabel></xhtml:a></geo></geo-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk><x eid="trip_x_14" <eb>pleasure</eb>;  <eb>joys</eb>  are often contrasted with  <eb>sorrows</eb>, but  <eb>delights</eb>  are not.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>delight å’Œ joy è¯­æ°”è¾ƒ pleasure joyful

satisfied with sth or not worried about it<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æŒ‡å¿«ä¹çš„ã€æ»¡æ„çš„ã€æ”¾å¿ƒçš„</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="happy_xgs_10" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51e7"><x-g-blk eid="happy_xg_25"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="happy_x_25" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51e5" e_inline="y" tranID="5" status="6">a happy marriage/memory/childhood<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>å¹¸ç¦çš„å©šå§»ï¼å›å¿†ï¼ç«¥å¹´</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="happy_xg_26"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="happy_x_26" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51e3" e_inline="y" tranID="7" status="6">I said I'd go, just to <ebi>keep him happy</ebi>.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æˆ‘è¯´æˆ‘è¦å»åªæ˜¯ä¸ºäº†è®©ä»–é«˜å…´ã€‚</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="happy_li_7" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51e1" e_inline="y"><unsyn>satisfied</unsyn> <und margined="n">pleased because you have achieved sth or because sth has happened as you wanted it to; being  <eb>content</eb>  can depend more on your attitude to your life: you can <ei eid="happy_ei_1" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51c9">have to be content</ei> or <ei eid="happy_ei_2" e_id="13cbabeaa27.-51c8">learn to be content</ei>. People or animals can be  <eb>contented</eb>  but only people can be  <eb>content</eb>.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>contented å¤šæŒ‡å› ç”Ÿæ´»èˆ’é€‚è€Œæƒ¬æ„ï¼›content å¤šæŒ‡å¯¹ç”Ÿæ´»çš„æ€åº¦ï¼Œå¯ä»¥ç”¨ <head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><div </>

</>

<head><link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="oalecd9.css" /><script src="oalecd9.js" charset="utf-8" type="text/javascript" language="javascript"></script></head><h-g eid="junction_hg_1"><top-g> junk bond

just a minute/moment/second

eid="justice_sng_7" n=""><def neh="n" noblk="y"><xhtml:a href="d:to">to</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:treat">treat</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a href="d:or">or</xhtml:a> <xhtml:a <label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><q>rather</q> <reg reg="fml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:fml">formal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> the reason why people take a particular action<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æŒ‡åŸå› ã€ç¼˜ç”±</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="reason_xgs_9" e_id="13cbac3027d.-868"><x-g-blk eid="reason_xg_34"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="reason_x_34" e_id="13cbac3027d.-866" e_inline="y" tranID="29" status="6">On what basis will this decision be made?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>å°†åŸºäºä½•ç§åŸå› ä½œå‡ºè¿™ä¸€å†³å®šå‘¢ï¼Ÿ</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="reason_li_12" e_id="13cbac3027d.-865" e_inline="y"><unsyn>excuse</unsyn> <und margined="n"> a reason, either true or invented, that you give to explain or defend your behaviour; a good reason that you give for doing sth that you want to do for other reasons<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æŒ‡ä¸ºè‡ªå·±è¡Œä¸ºæ‰€ä½œçš„è¾©æŠ¤ã€å€Ÿå£ã€ç†ç”±</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="reason_xgs_10" e_id="13cbac3027d.-863"><x-g-blk eid="reason_xg_35"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="reason_x_35" e_id="13cbac3027d.-861" e_inline="y" tranID="9" status="6">Late again! What's your excuse this time?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>åˆè¿Ÿåˆ°äº†ï¼ä½ è¿™æ¬¡æœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆå€Ÿå£ï¼Ÿ</chn></x></x-g-blk><x-g-blk eid="reason_xg_36"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="reason_x_36" e_id="13cbac3027d.-85f" e_inline="y" tranID="11" status="6">It gave me an excuse to take the car.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>è¿™ä½¿æˆ‘æœ‰ç†ç”±å¼€è½¦å»äº†ã€‚</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="reason_li_13" e_id="13cbac3027d.-85e" e_inline="y"><unsyn>motive</unsyn> <und margined="n"> a reason that explains sb's behaviour<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æŒ‡åŠ¨æœºã€åŸå› </chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="reason_xgs_11" e_id="13cbac3027d.-85c"><x-g-blk eid="reason_xg_37"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="reason_x_37" e_id="13cbac3027d.-85a" e_inline="y" tranID="13" status="6">There seemed to be no motive for the murder.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>è¿™èµ·è°‹æ€æ¡ˆçœ‹ä¸å‡ºæœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆåŠ¨æœºã€‚</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li><li eid="reason_li_14" e_id="13cbac3027d.-859" e_inline="y"><unsyn>justification</unsyn> <und margined="n"> <label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><q>rather</q> <reg reg="fml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:fml">formal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> a good reason why sth exists or is done<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æŒ‡äº‹ç‰©å­˜åœ¨æˆ–åšæŸäº‹çš„æ­£å½“ç†ç”±</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="reason_xgs_12" e_id="13cbac3027d.-856"><x-g-blk eid="reason_xg_38"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="reason_x_38" e_id="13cbac3027d.-854" e_inline="y" tranID="17" status="6">I can see no possible justification for any further tax increases.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æˆ‘çœ‹ä¸å‡ºè¿˜èƒ½æå‡ºä»€ä¹ˆç†ç”±æ¥åŠ ç¨äº†ã€‚</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="reason_h3_1" e_id="13cbac3027d.-853" e_inline="y" tranID="18" status="6">grounds or justification?<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>ç”¨ grounds è¿˜æ˜¯ justificationï¼Ÿ</chn></h3><p eid="reason_p_2" e_id="13cbac3027d.-852" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>Justification</eb>  is used to talk about finding or understanding reasons for actions, or trying to explain why it is a good idea to do sth. It is often used with words like <ei eid="reason_ei_4" e_id="13cbac3027d.-850">little</ei>, <ei eid="reason_ei_5" e_id="13cbac3027d.-84f">no</ei>, <ei eid="reason_ei_6" e_id="13cbac3027d.-84e">some</ei>, <ei eid="reason_ei_7" e_id="13cbac3027d.-84d">every</ei>, <ei eid="reason_ei_8" e_id="13cbac3027d.-84c">without</ei>, and <ei eid="reason_ei_9" e_id="13cbac3027d.-84b">not any</ei>.  <eb>Grounds</eb>  is used more for talking about reasons that already exist, or that have already been decided, for example by law: <ei eid="reason_ei_10" e_id="13cbac3027d.-849">moral/economic grounds</ei>.<chnsep> * </chnsep><chn>justification ç”¨æ¥è¡¨ç¤ºæ‰¾å‡ºæˆ–æ˜ç™½åšäº‹çš„ç†ç”±ï¼Œæˆ–è§£é‡Šè¦åšçš„äº‹ï¼Œå¸¸ä¸ littleã€noã€someã€everyã€without å’Œ not any ç­‰è¯è¿ç”¨ã€‚grounds å¤šæŒ‡å·²å­˜åœ¨çš„åŸå› æˆ–å·²å†³å®šçš„ï¼ˆå¦‚æ³•å¾‹ä¸Šçš„ï¼‰æ ¹æ®ï¼šmoral/economic groundsï¼ˆé“å¾·ï¼ç»æµåŸå› ï¼‰ã€‚</chn></und></p><ul eid="reason_ul_3" class="deflist" e_id="13cbac3027d.-848"><li eid="reason_li_15" e_id="13cbac3027d.-847" e_inline="y"><unsyn>pretext</unsyn> <und margined="n"> <label-g-blk>(<label-g><reg-blk><q>rather</q> <reg reg="fml"><xhtml:a href="helpr:fml">formal</xhtml:a></reg></reg-blk></label-g>) </label-g-blk> a false reason that you give for doing sth, usually sth bad, in order to hide the real reason<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>æŒ‡ä¸ºæ©ç›–åšæŸäº‹ï¼ˆé€šå¸¸ä¸ºä¸å¥½çš„äº‹ï¼‰çš„çœŸæ­£ç†ç”±è€Œæ‰¾çš„å€Ÿå£ã€æ‰˜è¾</chn>ï¼š</und><x-gs eid="reason_xgs_13" e_id="13cbac3027d.-844"><x-g-blk eid="reason_xg_39"><xsymb>â—†</xsymb><x eid="reason_x_39" e_id="13cbac3027d.-842" e_inline="y" tranID="23" status="6">He left the party early on the pretext of having to work.<chnsep> </chnsep><chn>ä»–å€Ÿå£æœ‰äº‹è¦å¤„ç†ï¼Œæ—©æ—©ç¦»å¼€äº†èšä¼šã€‚</chn></x></x-g-blk></x-gs></li></ul><h3 eid="reason_h3_2" e_id="13cbac3027d.-841" e_inline="y" tranID="45" status="1">Patterns</h3><ul eid="reason_ul_4" class="bullet" e_id="13cbac3027d.-840"><li eid="reason_li_16" e_id="13cbac3027d.-83f" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">(a/an) reason/explanation/grounds/basis/excuse/motive/justification/pretext  <eb>for</eb>  sth</und></li><li eid="reason_li_17" e_id="13cbac3027d.-83d" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">the reason/motive  <eb>behind</eb>  sth</und></li><li eid="reason_li_18" e_id="13cbac3027d.-83b" e_inline="y"><und margined="n"> <eb>on the</eb>  grounds/basis/pretext  <eb>of/thatâ€¦</eb> </und></li><li eid="reason_li_19" e_id="13cbac3027d.-838" e_inline="y"><und margined="n">(a)  <eb>good/valid</eb>  reason/explanation/grounds/excuse/motive/justification</und></li></ul></body></unbox></sn-g></sn-blk-nolist></sn-gs><idm-gs-blk><boxblock><xhtml:a href="help:id"><img jut
